itemDescription: English cricketer for Marylebone Cricket Club, born 1800

wikipedia_page.main: Charles Montague Williams (1800 – 17 March 1830) was an English first-class cricketer associated with Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC) who was active in the 1820s. He is recorded in one match in 1823, totalling 0 runs with a highest score of 0 and holding 2 catches.
